snippet: Officers are being deployed in a northern state to arrest people wearing what is deemed to be “indecent dress,” a representative of an Islamic agency said.
lead_paragraph: Officers are being deployed in a northern state to arrest people wearing what is deemed to be “indecent dress,” a representative of an Islamic agency said.

headline.main: Nigeria: Fashion Police Take on Cabbies
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Fashion Police Take On Cabbies
